name: Game Closure, Inc.
description: Provider of a mobile application intended to offer a HTML5 game development platform. The company's mobile application helps game studios to develop and publish games across the iOS and Android ecosystems, enabling users to play games on various devices.
one_liner: Provider of a mobile application intended to offer a HTML5 game development platform. The company's mobile application helps game studios to develop and publish games across the iOS and Android ecosystems, enabling users to play games on various devices.
